Title: The Troops of St. Tropez
Writer: Richard Balducci (original story), Jacques Vilfrid (screenplay), Jean Girault (screenplay), Jacques Vilfrid (adaptation), Jean Girault (adaptation), Jacques Vilfrid (dialogue)
Actors: Louis de Funès, Geneviève Grad, Michel Galabru, Daniel Cauchy
Plot: Gendarme Ludovic Cruchot is re-assigned to the French Riviera seaside resort town of Saint-Tropez where petty criminals and his own daughter give him a hard time.
